title: Federation of Associations in Indian Tourism & Hospitality (FAITH) appoints IHCL MD and CEO Puneet Chhatwal as chairman
description: "With the support of all the members I will strive to make FAITH, a strong policy advocacy body on issues related to tourism and hospitality industry and carry forward the legacy built by Mr Anand," said Chhatwal.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
